title: The Horny Minotaur
description: Sara was abducted and taken to an alternate dimension to be bred to an Other Worlder. When she gets to the breeding barn she is paired with a Minotaur who wants nothing to do with her. Warrick has been a prisoner of the “Breeders” for a year now. He has refused to breed to any female; not wanting the breeders to have his offspring. That is until Sara walks into his cage. Sara proves to be a bigger temptation than Warrick was prepared for.
author: Nikita King
